department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide labour, materials, tools, and supervision to clean ductwork using a high-pressure vacuum system at various areas of CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
# W684H - Ductwork Cleaning - CFB Halifax
================================ serie de punition ductworks nationally 

## Call for Standing Offer
--------------- call for standing offer

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified offerors to submit proposals to provide ductwork cleaning services, supporting the Department of National Defence(DND) to strengthen Canada’s readiness by maintaining optimal environmental quality within Data Centre facilities located at CFB Halifax. 

## Mandatory Tendering Procedure
-------------------------------- mandatory tendering procedure

* **Notice Type**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Bid Invitation Status**: Closed

## Eligibility Criteria
-------------------

* Companies are required to have a valid Canadian Goods and Services Tax (GST) account
* Successful Offeror will be expected to submit proof of compliance with all applicable trade agreements specifically mentioned [in the Trade Agreements Section]
* Offeror must have access to the required equipment and resources to complete the work which includes
	+ Truck mounted high-pressure vacuum system for cleaning ducts
	+ Top-tier, factory fresh replacement HEPA filters
* Offeror  must comply with all applicable occupational health and safety laws and regulations

## Important Dates
--------------- important dates and deadlines

* **Tender Closing Date**: July 16th, 2024 at 14:00:00 (UTC-02:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 9th, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Until the work is completed and the Government is satisfied.

## Contact Information
-------------------

* **Contracting Authority**: Dylon Leonard
* **Email**: <dylon.leonard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
